title.narrative: B2B: UniCool and Rijk Consultants K Ltd

description.narrative:
The objective of the co-operation is to create a modern service company in the cooling and refrigeration industry in Kenya as a joint-venture between our companies.
during the project phase of the co-operation continue and increase the training of our local staff and develop new focus areas for the new joint-venture UniCool and Central Electrical International created during the first stages of our co-operation.
The goal is to become one of the leading companies in Kenya in our segment over the next two years, providing advanced and environmental correct cooling solutions to the high end Kenyan market in particular in the hospitality, telecom and process industries where cooling is a critical factor. Through the utilization of advanced technology and knowhow from the Danish partner, we know we have a competitive advantage in terms of long-term operational savings for our clients through the supply of low energy cooling systems and highly durable system. This will enable our clients to gain considerable saving on electricity and maintenance over time, this is particular important for professional run operations e.g. telephone companies, international hotels and larger processors in the food and horticulture industries.
